REASON: Headaches,extreme nausea and vomiting
Nothing apart from feeling really spaced out and happy. Can I stay on them please??;-)
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: Never had this medication before so googled it and found this site. After reading the awful experiences that people have had on here I nearly didn't start to take them. I was horrified. How ever, glad I did because all that has happened is I feel really spaced out, a bit like I've been drinking. Think they knocked me out because I had the best nights sleep for a long time. Woke up this morning feeling amazing, after feeling rotten for weeks. Only had 3 tablets but I feel like a new woman!! Only down side is I'm not sure I'd be safe to drive feeling like this.

REASON: Dreadful dry mouth. I could hardly talk my lips and mouth were so dry, like I'd been in the desert for week with no water. Also had a sore throat, and sniffles. Stopped taking them.

Third day took one in morning and within 20 minutes I started a dry persistent cough and then had difficultly breathing, tight chest and pains and felt very unwell. Spent 6 hours at GP clinic. It is now on my banned list of antibiotics
Fatigue, loss of appetite
Severe breathlessness and chest pain.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: My GP told me to stop them immediately.
Do not take this drug.  Beware of side effects in many people.  Topix.com has much more info.  Search this drug and you may be shocked

REASON: Awful side effects - wheezing, shortness of breath, racing heart, nausea and feeling faint. A little research showed a scary link to lung difficulties and respritory failure. Would never recommend this drug to anyone, it can have very dangerous side effects.
No side effects whatsoever
Nausea, weakness, lethargy, lightheadedness, extreme fatigue, body pains, flu like symptoms.  I was barely functional.   Within a couple of days of stopping this medication the symptoms disappeared.

Mild headache, stomach cramps, mild pain behind eyes, mild aching in arms. Most surprising was a euphoric 'high', was in extremely good mood, I'm told this is unusual for Macrodantin but it made the other side effects easy to accept.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: It sorted out the UTI quickly and effectively.

REASON: No side effects. It seems to have worked extremely well and quickly, thank goodness.

Fuzzy head, headache, dry mouth, sore throat, aching joints, strange "bruised" feeling everywhere, palpitations  and EXTREME lethergy/tiredness. The drug has seemed to aleviate the symptoms of the infection but I feel absolutely horrendous. I'm not taking anymore and going straight back to the docs tomorrow. Feel like I'm drunk and in pain all over! I dread to think what it has done to my system to cause this reaction. I have arrithmia and can't believe I was prescribed this drug!
nausea and headache
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: took tablets with milk duering meals but made no differance had to stop taking them

REASON: As I was suffering fever from the UTI when I began the drug I didn't notice any side effects but by day 2 although the pain from the UTI had gone I started to feel very nauseous with constant dull headache, I felt I had no energy and was very tired all the time with no appetite.   Now feel generally unwell and depressed and have decided to stop taking Macrodantin after 4 days instead of 7.
Took 2 tablets the first day as I got it late in the day and felt some side effects like pains in my back and mouth, throat areas.

MACRODANTIN: Next morning uti felt better but was very anxious which carried on through the day plus really bad pain and trapped wind. Palpitations a lot and other pains in body which took my breath away they hurt that much. Seriously considering not taking it tomorrow if no UTI pain as i hate this medicine and it scares me. Suppose to take it for 7 days.
RATING: I had blood in my urine and tried lots of natural ways as I prefer them but just couldn't seem to shift it hence the antibiotics but its too hard to carry on.
REASON: F

Been taken it for 2 days , pressure on chest, throat seams to be swollen, terrible back pain, constant urination, nausea, bad smelling urine, just hope these get rid of infection as ive had every other anti biotics! :-(
first couple of doses I experienced back pain, but after continuing with my medication it has helped me significantly, no serious or noticeable side affects.
Currently taking macrodantin for a UTI! Feel awful:-

MACRODANTIN: Night sweats and fever like symptoms
Generally feeling very unwell, going to stop with immediate effect!!
REASON: F

Only take as a maintenance dose to prevent recurring uti's. First dose, severe abdominal pain, worse than labor pains. Didn't equate to this, but connected the dots after next experience. Second dose...Scariest night of my life!! Swollen tongue and lips, difficulty swallowing and speaking,tingling and numbness in hands, sweats, racing heart, weakness. Rushed to hospital with allergic reaction and given Benadryl. Took 2 days for swelling in tongue to completely go away. Wish i had seen this site before taking this...definitely not an appropriate medicine to take for preventative use.

I am already anemic and the drug does say be careful if youre anaemic, but my chest is so so heavy i cant even talk, im tired i cant eat where ifeel so bloated and full up!! i WISH it gave me an upset stomach i feel so huge!
Took the first capsule an hour and a half ago and feeling shaky, back pain is 10x worse, severe stomach pain.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: Not looking forward to taking the rest of the course.

REASON: muscle weakness and aching....joints aching...felt like flu symptoms...only worse!...migraines...fatigue...abdominal pain...acid reflux...had to go to the ER for continued symptoms...my liver enzymes were very elevated and out of whack...have liver toxicity/drug induced hepatitis from this medication!....the uti is gone however...but the havoc that is has wreaked on the rest of my system has not been worth it!!...i am having to do a liver detox now as a result of this medication....very displeased!...i just hope that irreparable damage has not been done to my liver
Frequent visits to the bathroom, right side pain, lower back pain, feeling weak, sleepless nights, coloured urine (this is normal), loss of appetite and not wanting to eat. No nausea
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: Visited doc with 2 days left to go on Macrodantin. Didn't seem worried and said that the tablet changes the way your gut works and to leave a week after taking the tablet to see if side effects settle down, if not to visit again. Have to take a urine sample after 1 week of finishing tablets to confirm the infection has cleared

REASON: I didnt get any side effects with this drug
I've quite severe UTI with bloody urine. After 4 capsules, the pain almost completely gone. About to take my 8th capsule.  Drowsy and diarrhea are the only side effects so far. But it's fairly mild.

Have so far experienced muscles stiffening, numbness/tingling as well as feeling physically weaker in arms and legs. These are listed as side effects but not as common ones...not sure if its worth seeing the docs again
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: Can tell it's working straight away - many symptoms of the persistent UTI have disappeared.

REASON: Extreme shortness of breath, wheezing and coughing after just 5 tablets
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I stopped taking the tablets as soon as the breathing difficulties started.  I recovered in a couple of days thereafter. I wouldn't take the medication again and am trying unsweetened 100% cranberry juice now.

REASON: Nausea, lower back pain, and tiredness,
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: Taking this medication seemed to exacerbate the symptoms of my UTI .  I had more frequent runs to the bathroom. The lower back pain increased more while taking this medication.  This medication was not for me.

REASON: Urinated a lot more.
F
Severe Headache

MACRODANTIN: General feeling of being very unwell

SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: 4  days30mg 4X D

REASON: After taking for five days developed pain in right side that would travel from my spine like an internal hot liquid all over my chest and down my arms which in turn made me feel anxious and panicky. It happened every evening after that until I finished the course and gradually was less intense but four days after finishing still have this but to a much lesser degree. Also had burning pain all down my spine & burning sensation also in my feet. I must stress I was also on another tablet at the same time but reading these reviews on this forum I think this tablet may have caused the symptoms. Also left me feeling anxious.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: Cleared the uti

REASON: First day very mild tiredness, felf a bit hot flush.But UTI's also makes me feel very tired and with fever.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I get reacurrent UTI's very often and when the doctor prescribe this I was a bit concerned because i never had them before.The colour of my urine changed to bright yellow i think is to do with the pill shell,by the 3rd day all UTI symptoms  were gone but i carried on taking till 7th day to make sure i finish the course.Know pain free. Yes i would take again.

REASON: No bad side effects whatsoever. The symptoms of the uti cleared up after three tablets and I had to take four 50MG tablets per day. I am writing this review because of all the negative reviews here. Some people do have adverse reactions to certain drugs but that does not mean everyone will. Don't be frightened by all you read here. Try it for yourself. It worked great for me and I would use it again if needed.
Felt I was dying. Head one side numb couldn't walk unaided, chest tight - felt horrendous. Am so worried that any damage already sustained is irreversible.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: Never ever take this terrible pill.

REASON: violent headache, fever, joint pain hacking cough which doctor thought was chest infection but wasnt, weakness in legs, doctor was goin 2 keep me on tablets but refused, trying a different antibiotic an just hope i feel better soon

Horrendous coughing every night for over a week now to the point i feel like i have cracked all my ribs because i am coughing so hard.i stopped taking them 3 days ago but the cough hasnt eased and now i am itching all over especially my feet. It has cleared the uti but i would rather get up 5 times a night for the toilet than experience the side effects of this drug.should not be prescribed
Tiredness, nausea, itching, mood swings, bloated, feeling of being full after not eating much, no appetite really -  eating because I know I have to, not because I feel hungry.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: So far taking for 3 days but duration of treatment is 10 days.

REASON: Only side effects have been chest tightness, doctor suggested ceasing use immediately.

Nausea, sickness, extreme weakness, lack of strength in legs, headache, breathlessness. These developed after my first course of the drug and it was thought I had a chest infection. On taking again, however, symptoms appeared after third tablet. I was in bed for four days after first course and for two days after te second, but was very weak and breathless with a cough for around ten days each time. I was so weak that I could not push the duvet back when in bed.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: Can't believe it could have passed trials with these awful side effects. My. doctor said I must never take it again. Lost in total most of December and half of January before I could leave house.

REASON: I have noticed that I am extremely tired now and put it down to my lifestyle and the stress. I have increased my supplementation to gve me increased energy but noticed that it isn't increasing my energy levels as they used to. So, I began to look at my eating habits which then pointed to the Macrodantin which I take at night. I read the sideffects and noted that legs felt weaker and had pain and that was me.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I felt that I was becoming lazy because I couldn't go out to bring in or hang up the washing. Everything was becoming a heavy chore and just to get up in the morning and get dressed and head into the day was a task. This just reinforced my sense of laziness of which that is not a character trait of mine. It has stopped the UTI's but I still suffer with the incontence of which no doctor has ever nbothered to investigate. I feel betrayed by the medical profession as I now have a huge monthly bill to pay for my incontinence pads. I just manage to get through all of this knowing that there are people far worse than me and I find ways to help others now.

REASON: I took it for seven days, caused me some nausea and diarrhea for about one day during the course, and then I was fine. Got the uti again after sex about 10 days later, currently back on macrodantin for another 7 days and I have started feeling nauseous again after two days on the treatment. It works to stop the pain of uti's, but the side effects are awful.
None so far !
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: Took first capsule 2 hours ago and already I'm feeling much better. Hope it continues but must say I have my worries after reading peoples comments on here !!!

REASON: I was so sick while taking this medicine i couldnt sleep constant nausea,vomiting and headaches i have taken myself off this tablet and going back to the doctor it is dangerous
NO SIDE EFFECTS
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: THIS DRUG HAS HAS BEEN A GODSEND FOR ME. IF I TRY TO STOP TAKING IT SYMPTOMS COME STRAIGHT BACK

REASON: headache and legs, flashing lights, vomiting, right side lower back pain, very drowsy etc...
Heavy chest, chills and really bad headache.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I would rather of had the infection, then deal with these side effect, my chest was so heavy I couldn't even talk as it was taken my breath away, the chills were just as bad one minute cold the next hot, two days on I still have a banging head and still feel hot and sweaty. Good news is after taken only 4 tablets the infection is better, not completely gone, and still have have 35 pills left.

REASON: The only side effects have been severe insomnia despite feeling very tired, and unusual night sweats.  Also experienced floaters and flashing lights in my right eye which I attributed to posterior vitreous detachment (a common non-pathological event) but having read some of the comments now wonder if it may have been a side-effect.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: Eliminated acute uti quickly, experienced none of the other problems that other people have complained of, despite my allergy to penicillin and the fact that many antibiotics do cause me digestive problems.

REASON: Lung failure. (DIFFUSE INTERSTITIAL PNEUMONITIS)
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: My mother (72yrs) recently died of long term use of this drug. Her lungs failed and it was noted on death certificate asttributed to the macrodantin.

REASON: I have been taking this for only 2 days and already have suffered from vomiting, constant nausea, stomach bloating/pains, extreme anxiety and depression, kidney pain, bad aches in both legs hips and arms, dizzy, no appetite and feel full after small amounts of food.

At first I had naussea and trouble sleeping. I quit on medication three days ago, and still have the WORST migraine pain I had in my entire life. I have always controlled my migraines with Fioricet, and taking them now is like I'm having placebo tablets to kill this pain. If I do something that elevates my blood pressure, or bend my head down I feel like my head is going to explode. I do not  recommend taking this medication, seriously.
Chills, aching legs, sensitive to touch, cough, chest heaviness, total lethargy, dizzy, fevers, right side lower back pain.
scarring of the lungs

I have chronic eosinophilic pneumonia as a result of Macrodantin I took 20 years ago.  It causes recurrent episodes of shortness of breath, chest pain, productive cough, low-grade fever.  I have to take corticosteroids with every exacerbation and am now being placed on them as a maintenance dose.  My lungs are damaged and irreparable.  It is incapacitating when I have symptoms.  Corticosteroids cause problems of their own.

I was in the worst ever pain you could imagine, and I swear I would have taken anything... Within 1 hour after taking the first tablet, the burning had halved... By this morning hardly there at all... had diarrhea but seems to have cleared up now. Will keep you updated again soon

i was given macrodantin by the hospital who diagnosed with acuse bladder infection, within an hour of taking it I had the worst head ache i had ever experienced in my life In fact I thought i was going to die. The doctor told me it was the pill fighting the infection, but I knew it was the pill. I felt if I took another i would die.

MACRODANTIN: The pain left me with a vice like feeling and sensitive head and face for 3 days afterwards. I have since suffered migraines, and worryingly after reading this and a year later have been back and fore the doctors with numbness.

RATING: It cleared up the infection almost after one tablet, I think it was just way too powerful for my system.
REASON: F
Difficulty breathing - even bought ashma pump.  Pains in legs - thought is was associated with recent flu.  Only when rash appeared on arms and legs did I suspect allergic reaction.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: Ceased medication 36 hours ago and all symptoms have disappeared.  I have been prescribed 42 days' medication (one 50 mg capsule per day).  Obviously I will never touch another such tablet.  Thought I had onset of Guillaine Barre syndrome!

REASON: MY MOTHER DIED AS A RESULT OF LONG TERM MACRODANTIN DOSE. FEMALE  DOCTOR FOUND TO BE NEGLIGENT BY MEDICAL BOARD AND HEALTH RIGHTS COMMISSION AFTER 4YRS. NO JUSTICE IN THIS WORLD - STILL PRACTISING

MACRODANTIN: AT THE GOLD COAST 19TH AVENUE SURGERY AND STILL ALIVE.
REASON: F

I took ONE tablet at 15h30.   At 19h30 I suddenly became ill - shivering uncontrollably as if with fever; headache; pains in legs; pains in chest.   Condition worsened quickly - I was finding it very difficult to breathe. Also experienced nausea and vomiting. Cotton mouth - difficulty speaking. Sudden, heavy phlegm on chest. Was rushed to emergency where I was diagnosed as being in severe anaphalaxis. Antihistamine was administered via IV -  took 2,5 hours to stabilise. Doctor also thought I had bronchitis or early pneumonia - but this is not possible as it came on extremely suddenly.  Later confirmed it was caused by the drug!!
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: My doctor was shocked at my reaction to the drug.  He says in all his years of practice, he has never had a patient show signs of allergy to the drug.

REASON: Took one pill of the generic form in evening after dinner.  During the night I felt numbness in my feet and arms/hands which awakened me.  When I awoke I was spinning dizzy and had diffucltiy speaking clearly. I reported to doctor and most effects seemed to have worn off.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I am very concerned.  I took this many years ago in college and I was fine but lately I have had a few situations where I am hypersensitve to meds.  It's been 2 days and I'm still feeling strange-dizzy again in the morning, conscioues and aware one eye sees close the other far, etc.  I am expecting this will all go away but wonder what is in it that causes this quick reaction so that I can avoid it in the future.  Beware if you have sensitivities.

REASON: REASON
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: SIDE EFFECTS FOR ABILIFY

REASON: Weight gain of 40 lbs, severe muscle cramps, decreased night vision, wakefulness and wandering at night, uncontrolled eyebrow movement, tooth decay, intermittent anxiety
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I would not be alive if it were not for this drug.  It completely changed my life after being on just about every other type of drug there is out there.  Worked within days.  Tried to get off of it once due to the weight gain and fell into a deep depression that was extremely scary.  Can't get off of it even if I wanted to.  Too scared.  Take it along with Seroquel and Topimax.  Depakote made me a vegetable.  I will have to live with the side effects, even though some have been mistaken for more serious illnesses such as MS.

REASON: intense headache, extreme nausea, involuntary jaw clenching, muscle spasms in jaw and neck.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: Truly felt that I was being poisened. Frightened that my clenched/twitching jaw muscles would not return to normal (known to cause twitches, sometimes permanent). Just felt very sick, like my whole body was rejecting this drug.

REASON: Extreme restlessness, agitation, aggravation, rage, insomnia, lack of appetite, depression, pacing
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I know this helps a lot of people so I won't say it's the "worst drug ever" but it has been the worst one I myself have ever taken. I only was able to sleep because of a sleep med prescribed at night but I'd be up again pacing within a few hours. Could not sit still. I would just sit and scream and cry because I was so agitated and didn't know why. Note that my psychosis that it was treating did not manifest in these ways so it wasn't just my illness. I wonder if taking Cogentin with it would have helped.

REASON: Stuffy nose ALL the time. Waking up at 2-4AM. Can't go back to sleep. Was on 5, put myself back to 2.5. Still miserable. Not biting anyone's head off, but restless & cloudy thinking. Yuck.
tired, blurry vision, lack of motivation, depressed
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: my doc put me on abilify after lithium started to destroy my kidneys.  i liked it a lot at first, but now i am so tired and depressed all of the time.  i have no idea how to handle this.  she has lowered the dose twice, but i am going to have to look into something else.  i can't take living like this anymore.

REASON: Major Weight Gain!
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: The only side effect I received from this Rx was weight gain, 30 pounds in total! However it has helped with delusions that I experienced during my major depression.

REASON: Extreme Weight Gain, High Cholesterol, Extremely High Sugar Levels
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I recommend this medicine for people not concerned with weight gain. For Bipolar it is a great medication. Mind wise I was fantastic, but my physical conditions are horrible. Now pre-diabetic. Switched to Seroquil XR 50MG. Working great!

REASON: Abilify brought me back to life. I was so sick and within a week i was feeling worlds better. I can not even describe how much it had helped me. No side effects.
I have woken up consecutively around 4 or 5 am since being on the drug and have not fallen back to sleep, causing me to be extremely tired.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I take it in addition to lithium. I find it has helped stabilize me but being overly tired causes me to be a wreck and worse off then before. I am going to try decreasing my dosage and see if I can sleep then.

REASON: Twitchy, jumpy, leg cramps. Serious decrease in attention span, continues long after discontinuation of drug - may have ruined my attention ability forever.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: After discontinuing the drug about 5 years ago, some serious side effects remain. Lost my attention span. Cannot read a full book, only articles about the size of those in a magazine, also cannot concentrate on a movie or tv show past about one hour. RECOMMEND YOU TO AVOID THIS DRUG AT ALL COSTS. DOWNSIDE IS NOT WORTH IT. OF COURSE, YMMV.

REASON: Tremors, insomnia, nausea, extreme weight gain, anxiety.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: My son was put on ability after suffering from depression and hallucinations. His anxiety level increased and he would go through periods of severe vomiting and nausea. He also developed insomnia. His weight started out at a thin 150 pounds within one year he was 245. We changed psychiatrists and she added zoloft and took him off the abilify. He has been off for over a year and still has extreme Carb cravings and is struggling to lose weight despite the fact he still has bouts of extreme nausea and vomiting.  I feel very strongly that abilify has caused lasting permanent side effects. Please do not let someone you love start this medicine.

REASON: Very drowsy all day, anxiety
major weight gain, has slowed me down a bit, but I'm not bothered by it - I still move too fast anyway
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: best drug I've ever been prescribed - lifted my depression when used as an add-on and stopped the racing thoughts that I always had and thought were normal

REASON: feeling of "drunk driving", blurred vision.. insomnia, but then extremely tired all day.. restless.. complete loss of concentration. eye twitching. my mood improved.. but side effects were too bad.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I finally stopped when I was too scared to drive and had a few total breakdowns at work and literally couldn't work or do my school work.. i lost ALL concentration and then went to see another pdoc for ADD/ADHD.. i stopped taking abilify but the eye twitching never stopped.. in fact, ive had random muscle spasms/contractions that have spread all over my body and become more constant as time goes on.. i have been off abilify for almost 2 months.... i feel my nerves sparking under the tip of my nose like theyve gone haywire.. the muscles in my legs, knees, feet, neck, EVERYWHERE... spasm ALL day long.. making it horribly hard for me to sleep now and some days more than others make it hard to focus.. going back to my doctor again later this month to see if theres possibly ANYTHING that can be done to help..

REASON: slurred speech, unsteady, acting like drunk
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I took it in the morning but it made me tired. I'm only on 1/2 a pill because I'm so sensitive to these type of meds. Then I tried it before bed but thought it kept me up.

MACRODANTIN: I go go go all day doing things until I'm wiped out and in pain.
I forget to take it at night so took it this morning and felt like I was drunk being obnoxious and crying easily.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: 11  days1 mg 1X D

REASON: shaking twitching over emotional
restlessness, insomnia
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: switched from clozaril to abilify because i had gained a significant amount of weight on the clozaril and was literally obese, drooling, and stupid. when i switched 9 months ago for a little over a week got less than 2hrs of sleep a night. went through many sleep medications (regular ambien 10mg, trazadone, lorazepam 2mg) all of which helped somewhat, adding an hour or two until I was prescribed ambien cr 12.5mg. getting 6 to 7 hours of sleep, lost over 50 lbs and feel much more like myself. This drug worked wonders for me after the side effects were treated.

REASON: The biggest side effects I have had are weight gain, and insomnia, and sleepiness.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: This drug has given me my life back. It took getting to 5mg for the depression tolift and stay lifted. I started at 2 mg ,and the depression lifted in three days, but didn't stay lifted, so we slowly kept increasing . I am so glad my doctor suggested this med. There are side effects, but I will tolerate them because the depression was horrible. The other side effect I have is gettign up early , around 7 am ,which I like .  Give it a try, and start the dose low if your sensitive to medication.

REASON: rapid heart rate. tremors in my hands similar to that of alcohol withdraw. fatigue. feeling washed out emotionally and disconnected from life. highly increased sexual desire. nausea, often awakening to feelings like morning sickness. decreased reflexes/reaction time. increased anxiety. increased paranoia.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: This is an awful, awful drug as are most antipyschotics. For 2 years we played with the abilify dose ranging from 5-15mg. We tried adding other drugs and removing other drugs all to make one drug work and combat the unpleasant side effects. Finally settled for abilify 10 mg plus clonazapam.

MACRODANTIN: In the end, doctors push these drugs and won't even toy with the idea that maybe with proper therapy in mild cases of mental disorders, one can thrive without meds. I finally pulled myself off and continue to keep it secret from pro-drug persons. Little if any withdraw. I still go to therapy, I am thriving much better in therapy without meds. I suggest trying this if at all possible instead of meds. You can always go back to meds if this isn't working.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: 2  years10 mg 1X D

REASON: Dizziness, no appetite
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I already feel better, even though it's only been 9 days.  My mind is more clear and I have less racing thoughts.

REASON: 2 days on 10 mg, then 5 days on 5 mg.  Accentuation of existing feelings of being drained, even on 5 mg.  I couldn't even sit on a park bench - reclined - a lady was very concerned - asked if I was OK, if there was anything she could do.  Lack of life force - near lack of ability to even look after myself.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I wondered about starting off on 2.5 mg to give my system the chance to get used to the side effects, but the psychiatrist said this was "no dose".  Thought I would try anyway, and double the dose after a couple of weeks, but after reading these other comments, I don't think I'll bother.

REASON: Daughter had severe muscle and leg pains. D/C after 5 days. "First cause no Harm" is what I follow for my child. The ABILIFY user sheet that came with the drug, the sheet said to report immediately to the doctor about the side effects. I did.
restlessness despite being very tired
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: This medication was not for me.  The first day was fine and made me feel better with more energy, but in the following days, I became unable to sit still.  I would be so tired, but I had to move.  I still take Abilify occasionally when I feel very low, but only for one day.

REASON: My daughter has experienced bouts of depression whilst taking these meds, tiredness very sleepy all the time, has no energy anymore, lost all motivation always mopey now and moaning, whingeing, very irritable, extreme hunger that is beyond ridiculous, not happy with any part of what this medication has done to my daughter except her violence and anger has almost completly gone. but fear that the pro'c do not outweigh the cons here, my daughter just isnt happy ever anymore very sad for me as her mother to watch am considering weaning her off these meds as soon as i have discussed with her pysciatrist.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: Tried Risperdone first (short term 3 months) did absolute wonders = apart from extreme weight gain. cannot go back to this apparently as have been told it is a short term drug only.

REASON: We complained with the psychiatrist about the medication risperdal, because even after two years we didn't see much improvement with it and my son was always much more nervous with than without risperdal.  The psychiatrist recommended to change to abilify and that was much worse.  My son didn't want to sleep anymore and was very disturbed and cried a lot.  The psychiatrist insisted to continue and recommended to combine abilify with seroquel.  Seroquel should in theory bring his sleep back.  Not so in practice.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: Life was hell for father and son during abilify medication time.  I am very pleased I took my son off it.  As a father of an autist, I would like to take the drug to try and understand what it does, however as I permanently need to take care of my son, I can't afford the risk.  It is a scary drug.  I can't recommend it.

REASON: At higher doses, heart palpitations, anxiety, blurry vision, tooth decay, muscle tics, restlessness.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I am sticking with the lowest dose (2.5mg) which has made big changes for me (less depression, more even moods and energy). I've tried higher doses and the difference was negligible but the side effects were much more of a problem.

REASON: tiredness,  weight gain.  The side effects have gottwen so bad that I was forced to quit the medication against dr.'s advice,  out of fear of death due to weight gain.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I will admit that I am somewhat biased:  I am absolute opposed, moral grounds, on the use of any mind-altering drugs for any purpose. Also,  due to my years of negative experiences with psychiatry,  my viewpoints tend somewhat toward the antipsychiatry side.  I am in no way connected with the Church of Scientology.

REASON: so sleepy, hiccups, anxiety, can't breathe deeply, major hunger, very warm
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: Hiccups were terrible, especially since I interract with the public. Slowed down so much, my manager told me to kick into gear which had never been a problem before.I am so hungry I want to eat everything I see. I'm also on Prozac but I needed an add on, think I'll ask for Wellbutrin again.

REASON: severe muscle weakness, tremors that have yet to stop 2 months in, not sleeping, pacing

I had terrible side effects to abilify, my reflex started getting slow and slow, i could not move fast, i started acting slow, had difficulty driving and working. My doctor said i was having parkison like symptons, so i stopped and now i am back to normal.
Tremor, anxiety, chest heaviness & pain, severe fatique, dizziness, loss of motivation, loss of libido, stroke-like episodes, weight gain, blurred vision, rapidly changing body temperature
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: This drug turns you into a mindless numb zombie while effectively attacking your nervous system creating serious life-threatening side-effects. The pill pusher that prescribed this poison to me refused to answer my phone calls while I was having a stroke which resulted in a frightening trip to the emergency room. The ER doctors had no idea how to treat me so I was essentially ejected from the premises. This drug will KILL you. I had no choice but to go completely off this drug cold turkey because my doctor totally abandoned me and still refuses to talk to me. I've been off Abilify for a week and I'm still feeling its harmful effects. AVOID AT ALL COSTS. This POISON will ruin your life.

REASON: I had akathisia (restless movement) from Abilify. My psychiatrist added propranolol and it completely stopped.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: It started working within a week or two, lifting me out of depression since it was paired with an antidepressant. I still have depressive episodes but they usually aren't as bad as they were in the past.

REASON: i would studder sweat like crazy eye twitching hyperactive cry for no reason heart pounding out my chest really high blood pressure pass out from panic attacks insomia talk really fast umm flame up inside theres more thid pill sucks i thought i was going to die
Abilify is a wondeful pill.  Its the only med that helps with (voices) and mania.  Compared to other atypical antipsychotics the low side effects are very minimal.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: insomnia, flat feeling, tired in AM, my head feels like its buzzing making it difficult for me to sleep, loss of motivation, hunger in the morning, increases my prolactin, does not give me akathisia - which is a very good thing.  Pdoc would rather give me Geodon, but I always insist Abilify because it does not give me akathisia.

MACRODANTIN: I'v been taking this med for 7 years.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: 3  years10MG 1X D

REASON: i love this pill it has been so good for me no more mania and just finally feel normal again...life was grim before this med!!!!
I really don't feel any positive results but what I do experience is sleeplessness and more anxiety at certain times(mainly around people)
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I think that these drug companies make studies to try and prove that the neurons in out brain aren't performing properly and they come up with these expensive drugs that don't really help most people. I have much better results and can live normally with my Alprazolam. They even had me on Cymbalta at the same time as Abilify just as trial and error. My problems are with anxiety disorders triggered by certain circumstances and not a problem with the way my neurons in my brain are firing. I would say that Abilify is just another expensive drug the pharmaceutical companies are trying to promote for greater income instead of positive results in patients. I don't think the box above got my dosage right. I was started out on 30mg twice a day and now take 60mg twice a day. I really feel that it is making me more depressed and anxious.

REASON: Increased cholesterol, weight gain, severe food cravings.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I LOVE Abilify.  I took this medication for 3 years.  This drug made me "the most normal I've ever been" to quote my mother.  I do however dislike some of the side effects.  I gain weight very quickly on Abilify and experience intense food cravings.  I found that cutting out all processed foods and sugar helped me to stabilize my weight and stop the food cravings.  Unfortunately, no matter how healthfully I ate, my cholesterol went through the roof.  Even on a vegan diet my cholesterol was out of control.  The Dr. took me off Abilify due to it causing an increased cholesterol level.  I'm hoping my new med will work as well as Abilify with less side effects.  If you take this medication, even if you have no noticeable side effects, please make sure your doctor checks your bloodwork at least 4 times per year.

RATING: depression, add to Paxil to boost
REASON: occasional nausea, constipation, helped with fiber and plenty of water, small lip twitching like you may get a twitch in your eye sometimes.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I have noticed a difference in my mood and energy level.  I sleep better at night, but do have vivid dreams that are weird. Am no more hungry than before.  I recommend this drug to those who are considering it.

REASON: The feeling was like a non-stop motor inside of my mind and body. Abilify gave me 10 times wore panic then I was experiencing in the first place. For soeone that has battled panic disorder and general anxiety for over 6 years this is the worst drug I have ever taken. I am still feeling the after effects of this terrible medication.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: Do not take these meds for panic/anxiety!

REASON: severe drowsiness, restless legs
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: Within a few days of taking Abilify, I knew it wasn't for me. I would have a hard time keeping my eyes open at school, at the same time fidgeting to high heaven. (Bone tired, but the fidgeting kept me awake, it was very frustrating.) I can't say whether it would have eased my depression because I stopped--- in my case the physical side effects were too overwhelming.

REASON: a lot of lethargy, going into depression,
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: abilify has somewhat helped me in clearing negative thoughts and other people talking about me, it has brought back my sharpness a bit, its kind of made me normal except i feel lethargic and sleepy throughtout the day but cant really sleep,

REASON: suicidal thoughts & extreme mania
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I was put on this and lamictal at the same time. After a few weeks everything got worse, my anxiety level was so high. I eventually had a horrible mania phase that resulted in moving 3,000 miles away, and then back, and once again 3,000 miles away. I also suffered from suicidal thoughts--I wanted out! After getting off of it, and upping my lamictal I have been so much better.

REASON: Less tired! More motivation! slight more anxiety. Worked in 3 to 4 days.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: Please, someone give some good feedback about Abilify. I wonder why so many negative remarks. Because we are all different I suppose. I am not bipolar, but Zoloft alone was not cutting it. I still wanted to sleep the day away! Adding Abilify has been wonderful. I  now can't sleep during the day even if I tried! At night I am out quickly, from all the motivation and work that I have done throughout the day. This has worked great for me. Please, someone tell me you agree!!

REASON: Wow...  Three days was too long to be on this medication.. Can you say "massive food cravings"??  Geez, I'm not much of an eater, and almost immediately I wanted to bake all kinds of crap and eat constantly.  Sugar, bread, etc. What is up with that????  No more Abilify for me..  I can't imagine THAT helping my mood at ANY point!
None
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: This is an amazing drug that has helped my resistant depression.

MACRODANTIN: I have been taking Prozac for 15 years.  I have been on dosages

ranging from 20 mg. up to 80 mg.  Recentely I started experiencing reacurring depression.  My doctor started me on a low dose of Abilify and within 1 day I could start to feel my mood lift.  Within one week on the Abilify, I have begun to enjoy many outside interests that I did not want to have anything
to do with. For me, it has been a wonder drug!
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: 2  weeks2 mg. 1X D

REASON: Permanent muscle twitching, rapid weight loss, inability to function much less concentrate or sleep.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I have taken Prozac for 7 years to help with OCD and Bipolar II..when prozac lost its effect, I addef on Abilify. Within a week I started hving uncontrollable facial twitches and my neck was turning on its own. It has been 2 years since I hae stopped taking it and the facial twitches are still present. Be warned.

REASON: None
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: Absolutely has changed my life. Have been stable for 3 years now. Was very agitated and couldn't get rid of my depression even though I was on medication for depression. Free of depression for the first time in my life. And no agitation (manic).

REASON: hungry......otherwise I feel like a real person for the first time in YEARS!!!
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I think the Lexapro is the reason I have gained 10lbs. the doctor changed my meds to Prozac in stead and I feel great. I am now able to function in social situations and dont feel the need to hide in my house. I dont feel like people are talking about me as much and I have alot more energy. I hope its not the Abilify that made me gain weight because I will still risk my mental health to avoid getting real big....dont judge

REASON: Middle range sedated
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: All anti psychotics slow you down. I found this med to be better than most

REASON: irritation, AKATHESIA, weight gain, suicidal tendencies
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: Abilify is a horrible drug! considering it has a long effect it took me about a week to stop feeling side effects even after stopping. i made trips to the emergency rooms because it drove me crazy and caused suicide thoughts. Please take caution with this medication.

REASON: weight gain, nausea, depression, anxiety
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I would NOT recommend this drug to anyone. I began sinking into a horrible depression after 2 years on this drug and I do not take any other drugs on a daily basis. The weight gain is horrible and no matter how much dieting and exercise I do, the weight will not come off!

REASON: insatiable hunger and weight gain; lack of energy and loss of interest in activities I used to enjoy
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: There must be a better med. somewhere than this without the undesirable side effects (the commercial doesn't refer to it but it should emphasize you become a zombie). My personal recommendation is get a DOG and get out of the house!!

REASON: My heart has been racing like mad, at one point I was afraid I was going to have a heart attack. My panic disorder has seemed to worsen since I've taken Abilify, and I have tremors more often than before. I am extremely mean, irritable and rude to others, even when I don't want to be. I've been numb at some points emotionally, but that has only happened once. I can't sleep, and if I manage to I wake up in the morning with my mind racing, and I end up jumping out of bed and doing things in a hyperactive manner. My chest feels heavy, and I am either burning up in a sweat or freezing cold.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: A lot of people have said it's an amazing drug, but I must just be the 1 in 100 or 1000 that experienced the more serious side effects.

REASON: Extreme insomnia - went from sleeping 9-10 hours night which is needed due to chronic fatigue syndrome to only 5 hours per night even though I'm on a very potent sleep medicine.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: The 1st day I felt like a zombie. The 2nd day and forward, I was unusually happy for someone who has had 3 deaths in their family in the last 6 months. Also increased my appetite which led to 3 # weight gain in those 10 days.

REASON: Hypomania - like taking extra strong shots of espresso every couple of hours.  Completely restless, unable to concentrate, irritable/mean, everyone around moving too slowly, racing thoughts etc.  This drug was supposed to help me with anxiety, which it has, I'm too manic to care.  It has not effected my foggy brain, made anything clearer, or helped me in any way.  I just have a frantic energy like I want to go run five marathons back to back.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: Maybe will work well for some, didn't for me.

REASON: Sleep has decreased from 12 hrs a nite to 7 hrs. I do not feel hungry constantly. I do feel a bit hyper, but that was normal before the depression/anxiety. It may or may not be making it worse.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I actually sleep better at nite, fall asleep faster, and wake up more refreshed. This medicine has made a big difference, I feel like I woke up from a 6 month coma and am back to being able to get things done.

REASON: drowsy and spaced out while feeling restless. Cannot stop "wondering" around the house.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I feel like a zombie when I take abilify. Even though my legs and feet are tired from wondering, I still cant seem to stop or sit still. Going to talk to my doc about this

REASON: hiccups, dizzyness, excessive need to sleep, nausea, hypoglycemia
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I know I just started the drug but I do feel much more stable moodwise.  I am hoping the side effects subside soon and that this will finally be a drug that works more than a month

REASON: Extreme Fatigue
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: It made me absolutely exhausted, I would sleep for 15 hours at night and wake up even more tired than when I went to bed. It did keep me from being extremely depressed though, because when I stopped taking it I wound up being hospitalized for depression. Doesn't mean it won't work for others though!

REASON: Sometimes get tardive dyskinesia. Slight headache.
SIDE EFFECTS FOR MACRODANTIN: I'm sorry but I can deal with my involuntary movements from the medicine but after 5 days I feel like a different person already.  I'm not in bed all day anymore and things I used to have interest in I'm interested again.  I even lost my job last week but I don't care as long as I feel better than before.  It was Hell before Abilify.
